name: GenitalHerpesTestsForHerpesSimplexVirusType2Antibody
title: Genital herpes (Tests for Herpes simplex virus type 2 Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Herpes simplex virus type 2 Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Herpes simplex virus type 2 Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
